verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֬חַ׀ <WH5329> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician לִבְנֵי־ <WH1121> [Tliv-nei-for the sons קֹ֬רַח <WH7141> Ko-rach of Korah מִזְמֽוֹר׃ <WH4210> miz-Mor. A Psalm רָצִ֣יתָ <WH7521> ra-Tzi-ta thou hast been favourable יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh LORD אַרְצֶ֑ךָ <WH776> 'ar-Tze-cha; unto thy land שַׁ֝֗בְתָּ <WH7725> ve-ta thou hast brought back; שְׁבוּת she-vut כשְׁבִ֣ית <WH7622> she-Vit captive קיַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko. of Jacob

נָ֭שָׂאתָ <WH5375> Na-sa-ta Thou hast forgiven עֲוֹ֣ן <WH5771> 'a-Von the iniquity עַמֶּ֑ךָ <WH5971> 'am-Me-cha; of thy people כִּסִּ֖יתָ <WH3680> kis-Si-ta thou hast covered כָל־ <WH3605> chol all חַטָּאתָ֣ם <WH2403> chat-ta-Tam all their sin סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. Selah

אָסַ֥פְתָּ <WH622> 'a-Saf-ta Thou hast taken away כָל־ <WH3605> chol all עֶבְרָתֶ֑ךָ <WH5678> 'ev-ra-Te-cha; all thy wrath הֱ֝שִׁיב֗וֹתָ <WH7725> he-shi-Vo-ta, thou hast turned מֵחֲר֥וֹן <WH2740> me-cha-Ron [thyself] from the fierceness אַפֶּֽךָ׃ <WH639> 'ap-Pe-cha. of thine anger

שׁ֭וּבֵנוּ <WH7725> u-ve-nu Turn אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei us O God יִשְׁעֵ֑נוּ <WH3468> yish-'E-nu; of our salvation וְהָפֵ֖ר <WH6565> ve-ha-Fer toward us to cease כַּֽעַסְךָ֣ <WH3708> ka-'as-Cha and cause thine anger עִמָּֽנוּ׃ <WH5973> 'im-Ma-nu. toward

הַלְעוֹלָ֥ם <WH5769> hal-'o-Lam alway תֶּֽאֱנַף־ <WH599> te-'e-naf- Wilt thou be angry בָּ֑נוּ Ba-nu; תִּמְשֹׁ֥ךְ <WH4900> tim-Shoch continue אַ֝פְּךָ֗ <WH639> 'ap-pe-cha, thine anger לְדֹ֣ר <WH1755> le-Dor to all וָדֹֽר׃ <WH1755> va-Dor. to all

הֲֽלֹא־ <WH3808> ha-lo- not אַ֭תָּה <WH859> 'At-tah Yourself תָּשׁ֣וּב <WH7725> ta-Shuv us again תְּחַיֵּ֑נוּ <WH2421> te-chai-Ye-nu; Wilt thou not revive וְ֝עַמְּךָ֗ <WH5971> ve-'am-me-cha, that thy people יִשְׂמְחוּ־ <WH8055> yis-me-chu- may rejoice בָֽךְ׃ Vach.

הַרְאֵ֣נוּ <WH7200> har-'E-nu Shew יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH2617> chas-De-cha; us thy mercy וְ֝יֶשְׁעֲךָ֗ <WH3468> ve-yesh-'a-cha, us thy salvation תִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> tit-ten- and grant לָֽנוּ׃ La-nu.

אֶשְׁמְעָ֗ה <WH8085> 'esh-me-'Ah, I will hear מַה־ <WH4100> mah- what יְדַבֵּר֮ <WH1696> ye-dab-Ber will speak הָאֵ֪ל׀ <WH410> ha-'El what God יְה֫וָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD כִּ֤י׀ <WH3588> ki for יְדַבֵּ֬ר <WH1696> ye-dab-Ber for he will speak שָׁל֗וֹם <WH7965> sha-Lom, peace אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to his עַמּ֥וֹ <WH5971> am-Mo unto his people וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- to his חֲסִידָ֑יו <WH2623> cha-si-Dav; and to his saints וְֽאַל־ <WH408> ve-'al- nay יָשׁ֥וּבוּ <WH7725> ya-Shu-vu but let them not turn again לְכִסְלָֽה׃ <WH3690> le-chis-Lah. to folly

אַ֤ךְ׀ <WH389> 'ach Surely קָר֣וֹב <WH7138> ka-Rov [is] nigh לִירֵאָ֣יו <WH3373> li-re-'Av them that fear יִשְׁע֑וֹ <WH3468> yish-'O; Surely his salvation לִשְׁכֹּ֖ן <WH7931> lish-Kon may dwell כָּב֣וֹד <WH3519> ka-Vod him that glory בְּאַרְצֵֽנוּ׃ <WH776> be-'ar-Tze-nu. in our land

חֶֽסֶד־ <WH2617> che-sed- Mercy וֶאֱמֶ֥ת <WH571> ve-'e-Met and truth נִפְגָּ֑שׁוּ <WH6298> nif-Ga-shu; are met together צֶ֖דֶק <WH6664> Tze-dek righteousness וְשָׁל֣וֹם <WH7965> ve-sha-Lom and peace נָשָֽׁקוּ׃ <WH5401> na-Sha-ku. have kissed

אֱ֭מֶת <WH571> 'E-met Truth מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> me-'E-retz of the earth תִּצְמָ֑ח <WH6779> titz-Mach; shall spring out וְ֝צֶ֗דֶק <WH6664> ve-Tze-dek, and righteousness מִשָּׁמַ֥יִם <WH8064> mish-sha-Ma-yim from heaven נִשְׁקָֽף׃ <WH8259> nish-Kaf. shall look down

גַּם־ <WH1571> gam- Indeed יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh Yea the LORD יִתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> yit-Ten shall give הַטּ֑וֹב <WH2896> hat-Tov; [that which is] good וְ֝אַרְצֵ֗נוּ <WH776> ve-'ar-Tze-nu, and our land תִּתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> tit-Ten shall yield יְבוּלָֽהּ׃ <WH2981> ye-vu-Lah. her increase

צֶ֭דֶק <WH6664> Tze-dek Righteousness לְפָנָ֣יו <WH6440> le-fa-Nav before יְהַלֵּ֑ךְ <WH1980> ye-hal-Lech; shall go וְיָשֵׂ֖ם <WH7760> ve-ya-Sem him and shall set לְדֶ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> le-De-rech [us] in the way פְּעָמָֽיו׃ <WH6471> pe-'a-Mav. of his steps
